question: You are going on holiday to a city overseas where your friend lives.Write a letter to your friend. In the letterWrite about your plansRequest information where to stay  Ask about the best places to visit
text: Hope you’re doing great. I’m just writing about my trip. I can’t tell you how excited I’m to be coming to Toronto City.

I’ve booked flights and arrive in two weeks from now at 8pm on August 6, which Is a Saturday. I’ve not much organised at the moment apart from few places like city tower and Niagara Falls. I hope I’d rather go there first and explore more, with your help of course.
As I’m from India and don’t have much knowledge about Toronto City, so it would be great if you give me a bit of insight about some places where I can stay and enjoy my holiday.
I remember that it has been around 2 years when you moved to Canada, so you must have explored several famous areas. Therefore, I want you to recommend to me some exquisite sites to visit.
Anyway, I will let you know when I get arrived and text me about the stuff that I’ve asked for. Catch you soon buddy.
